TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InPlaceHostingManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Install or update a ClickOnce deployment on a computer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>撰寫程式的該安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式以程式設計的方式。 比方說，您可以在受控制的系統管理軟體 (SMS) 環境中或在您需要複雜的安裝會執行多個在本機電腦上的安裝前或安裝後作業的情況下，使用這個類別。 一般而言，您會想要使用這個類別的成員，以特定順序：
1. 建立 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> 的新執行個體。
2. 下載部署資訊清單使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>。
3. 應用程式可以使用可執行的適當權限的核取<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>。
4. 下載並安裝應用程式使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>。
- 如果您呼叫任何這些參數的順序，它們將會擲回例外狀況。
<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> 可以安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式，但無法執行。 某些方法，在此類別，例如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>，已保留供下載的 Windows Presentation Foundation 為基礎的應用程式的網頁瀏覽器內執行時。
若要使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>若要下載並安裝應用程式，您必須確定憑證來簽署[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]想要安裝的應用程式用戶端電腦上已安裝為受信任的發行者。 如需有關受信任的發行者的詳細資訊，請參閱[受信任的應用程式部署概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b24a1702-8fbe-45b1-87a0-9618a0708f1d)。
> [!NOTE] > 目前沒有可防止產品限制<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>當您偵錯使用 Visual Studio 程式碼正常運作。 如果您偵錯您的應用程式，在 Visual Studio 中使用 F5 鍵，此範例會擲回神祕的例外狀況時呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>。 若要偵錯使用 Visual Studio，但不偵錯，啟動應用程式，再附加偵錯工具。 或者，您可以使用另一個偵錯工具，例如 WinDbg。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式以程式設計方式在用戶端電腦上。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri deploymentManifest) cil managed

Docs.param: A Uniform Resource Identifier () to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application's deployment manifest.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified browser-hosted application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要下載的 Windows Presentation Foundation 為基礎的應用程式裝載在網頁瀏覽器中，會使用這個建構函式。 若要下載 Windows Form 為基礎的應用程式使用部署[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]，使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A>建構函式`launchInHostProcess`參數設定為`false`。

Docs.exception: can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri deploymentManifest, bool launchInHostProcess) cil managed
Public Sub New (deploymentManifest As Uri, launchInHostProcess As Boolean)

Docs.param: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the deployment manifest of the application that will be installed.
Whether this application will be run in a host, such as a Web browser. For a stand-alone application, set this value to .
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified application, which can be either a stand-alone Windows Forms-based application or an application hosted in a Web browser.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>，可讓您下載 Windows Form 為基礎的應用程式部署使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

Docs.exception: can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

Docs.summary: Determines whether the ClickOnce application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssertApplicationRequirements() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>之後<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>成功傳回。 您不能呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>除非您呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>，並傳回不會發生錯誤。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>，它的成功主體中呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>事件處理常式。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

Docs.exception: Raised if this method is called before the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssertApplicationRequirements(bool grantApplicationTrust) cil managed

Docs.param: If , the application will attempt to elevate its permissions to the required level.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`grantApplicationTrust`已`true`，<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>會授與應用程式提高的權限，如果需要它們。 如果這是只有<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>能夠授與這些權限。 例如，如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式已安裝較大的套件的一部分，並安裝程式授與完全信任，請<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>能夠授與[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式完全信任。 如果`grantApplicationTrust`是`false`，應用程式將不會具有任何權限。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>。 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> 保留在無法使用的狀態。 之後呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有的參考<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>所佔用。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。
> [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>。 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DownloadApplicationAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Downloads an application update in the background.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您必須呼叫這個方法之後呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>，其中一端的成功呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>事件處理常式。
下列程式碼範例假設您有已定義並建立的執行個體<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>名為`iphm`。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

Docs.exception: Raised if this method is called before the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event DownloadApplicationCompleted As EventHandler(Of DownloadApplicationCompletedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Occurs when the application has finished downloading to the local computer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果您要安裝的 Windows Form 為基礎的應用程式，您必須指示使用者啟動應用程式本身，您無法使用，以程式設計方式啟動 Windows Form 應用程式<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>方法。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的處理常式<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationCompleted>事件。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event DownloadProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Occurs when there is a change in the status of an application or manifest download.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在主控台應用程式中，事件會指派給執行緒從執行緒集區。 因此，您可能會收到進度更新事件順序，後續的事件顯示相較於先前的事件所減少的量。 因為 Windows Form 中的事件會依序處理，從使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒的訊息佇列，不會看到 Windows Form 為基礎的應用程式，在這種行為。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>中所含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle Execute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Launches the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, if and only if it is a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application running in a Web browser.
Docs.returns: An corresponding to the launched application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是僅適用於 Windows Presentation Foundation 為基礎的應用程式可裝載在網頁瀏覽器 (亦即，其部署資訊清單定義`hostInBrowser`XML 項目)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GetManifestAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Downloads the deployment manifest of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application in the background, and raises an event when the operation has either completed or encountered an error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要接收通知此事件完成時，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>事件。 如果會呼叫此事件，而且沒有錯誤會以<xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>，您應該接著呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>以確認應用程式必須在本機電腦上執行的權限。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>方法。 處理常式<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>事件回撥會檢查以查看資訊清單下載已順利完成，且如果是的話，會提示使用者與應用程式的其他資訊。 如果使用者同意繼續進行安裝時，處理常式會呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>。
下列程式碼範例假設您有已定義並建立的執行個體<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>名為`iphm`。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event GetManifestCompleted As EventHandler(Of GetManifestCompletedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Occurs when the deployment manifest has been downloaded to the local computer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>的屬性<xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>檢查是否<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>順利完成，或傳回錯誤。 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>為 null，<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>順利完成，而且您可以呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>方法。 處理常式<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>事件回撥會檢查以查看資訊清單下載已順利完成，且如果是的話，會提示使用者與應用程式的其他資訊。 如果使用者同意繼續進行安裝時，處理常式會呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>。
下列程式碼範例假設您有已定義並建立的執行個體<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>名為`iphm`。
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#2)]
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UninstallCustomAddIn(string subscriptionId) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UninstallCustomAddIn (subscriptionId As String)

Docs.param: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the add-in to remove.
Docs.summary: Removes a previously installed user-defined component of an application.
Docs.exception: is not a valid subscription identity, or does not include a name, public key token, processor architecture, and version number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UninstallCustomUXApplication(string subscriptionId) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UninstallCustomUXApplication (subscriptionId As String)

Docs.param: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to remove.
Docs.summary: Removes a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that includes the <customUX> element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會解除安裝先前已安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]使用應用程式`<customUX>`中的項目[ <entryPoint>項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10ad3083-10c1-4189-a870-9bba2eab244f)。
自訂的安裝程式不會建立的新增或移除程式項目[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式必須儲存在中找到的訂用帳戶識別碼<xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs.SubscriptionIdentity%2A>在安裝期間的屬性。
